Introduction

Performance Team or Performance Unit is a sub-unit of the boy group SEVENTEEN (Korean: SVT 퍼포먼스팀; Japanese: SVTパフォーマンスチーム). They are responsible for choreography, dance, and overall performance.

The Members Consist of Hoshi, Jun, The8, And Dino.
